queryData.sublistquery: select sub.USER_ID, sub.SUBSCRIBER_ID as SUBSCRIBER_ID from AM_SUBSCRIBER sub, AM_API api, AM_APPLICATION app, AM_SUBSCRIPTION subc where sub.TENANT_ID='{{tenantId}}' AND api.API_ID=subc.API_ID AND app.APPLICATION_ID=subc.APPLICATION_ID AND sub.SUBSCRIBER_ID=app.SUBSCRIBER_ID
queryData.mainquery: select app.CREATED_TIME as CREATED_TIME, app.NAME, app.CREATED_BY as time from AM_APPLICATION app, AM_SUBSCRIBER sub {{subscriptionTable}} where sub.SUBSCRIBER_ID=app.SUBSCRIBER_ID AND sub.TENANT_ID='{{tenantId}}' {{subscription}} {{apiName}} {{subscriberId}} AND app.CREATED_TIME between '{{timeFrom}}' AND '{{timeTo}}' group by app.CREATED_TIME, app.APPLICATION_ID, app.CREATED_BY, app.NAME
